title: Coding 207: Python - Putting it all together
slug: Use all of the Coding 201 skills to retrieve and save a list of devices of specific type.

files.title: Step 1: Find the DNA Center API Reference documentation
Step 2: Configure logging and ask the user for input
Step 3: Use the DNA Center APIs to retrieve the device list
Step 4: Parse the JSON in the response and write the devices to a file
